title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.

title: Bad Sisters’ Eve Hewson, Fiona Shaw, Sarah Greene, Eva Birthistle and Anne-Marie Duffy Tease a Season 2 Inevitability: ‘Secrets Come Just Tearing Out of Us, Don’t They?’
description: The Garvey girls are at it again. When Bad Sisters returns for Season 2 Wednesday, the Apple TV+ series picks up two years after the events of Season 1. That means that the Sisters Garvey —  Eva, Becka, Ursula, Bibi and Grace — have had plenty of time to reckon with their involvement in the […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Donald Trump Chooses Fox News Host Pete Hegseth as Secretary of Defense
description: Donald Trump is plucking his new Secretary of Defense straight from the Fox News studios. The President-elect will nominate Fox News host Pete Hegseth to be the Secretary of Defense in his new administration, Trump announced on Tuesday. (Hegseth will still need to be confirmed by the Senate before assuming the Cabinet position.) A veteran […]
author: Dave Nemetz
